Ahri.name: AhriБ
Ahri.title: Ббthe Nine-Tailed FoxбБ
Ahri.lore:
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯUnlike other foxes that roamed the woods of southern Ionia, Ahri had always felt a strange connection to the magical world around her; a connection that was somehow incomplete. Deep inside, she felt the skin she had been born into was an ill fit for her and dreamt of one day becoming human. Her goal seemed forever out of reach, until she happened upon the wake of a human battle. It was a grisly scene, the land obscured by the forms of wounded and dying soldiers. She felt drawn to one: a robed man encircled by a waning field of magic whose life was quickly slipping away. She approached him and something deep inside of her triggered, reaching out to the man in a way she couldn't understand. His life essence poured into her, carried on invisible strands of magic. The sensation was intoxicating and overwhelming. As her reverie faded, she was delighted to discover that she had changed. Her sleek white fur had receded and her body was long and lithe - the shape of the humans who lay scattered about her.ЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйHowever, though she appeared human, she knew that in truth the transformation was incomplete. A cunning creature, she adapted herself to the customs of human society and used her profound gift of beauty to attract unsuspecting men. She could consume their life essences when they were under the spell of her seductive charms. Feeding on their desires brought her closer to her dream, but as she took more lives, a strange sense of regret began to well within her. She had reservations about actions which never troubled her as a fox. She realized that she could not overcome the pangs of her evolving morality. In search of a solution, Ahri found the Institute of War, home of the most gifted mages on Runeterra. They offered her a chance to attain her humanity without further harm through service in the League of Legends.ЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгД''Mercy is a human luxury... and responsibility.''ДгГбБ
-- AhriБ
Ahri.blurb: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯUnlike other foxes that roamed the woods of southern Ionia, Ahri had always felt a strange connection to the magical world around her; a connection ...
allytips: БбГгДдЖжЗзUse Charm to set up your combos, it will make landing Orb of Deception and Fox-Fire dramatically easier.ИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжInitiate team fights using Charm, and chase down stragglers with Spirit Rush.ЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйSpirit Rush enables Ahri's abilities, it opens up paths for Charm, helps double hitting with Orb of Deception, and closes to make use of Fox-Fire.ЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
enemytips: БбГгДдЖжAhri's survivability is dramatically reduced when her Ultimate, Spirit Rush, is down.ЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗзИStay behind minions to make Charm difficult to land, this will reduce Ahri's damage potential significantly.ИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

spells.name: БбOrb of DeceptionБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзAhri sends out and pulls back her orb, dealing magic damage on the way out and true damage on the way back.ИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip: Deals Б{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})БбГг magic damage on the way out, and ГбБ{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})БбГ true damage on the way back.ГбБ

spells.name: БFox-FireБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖAhri releases three fox-fires, that lock onto and attack nearby enemies.ЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip: БбГгДдЖжЗReleases three fox-fires that lock on to nearby enemies (prioritizes Champions) dealing ЗжЖдДгГбБ{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})БбГгДдЖжЗз magic damage. Enemies hit with multiple fox-fires take 50% damage from each additional fox-fire.ЗжЖдДгГбБ

spells.name: CharmБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзИAhri blows a kiss that damages and charms an enemy it encounters, causing them to walk harmlessly towards her.ИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip: БбBlows a kiss dealing бБ{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})БбГгДдЖж magic damage and charms an enemy causing them to walk harmlessly towards Ahri for ЗжЖдДгГбБ{{ e2 }}Б second(s).Б

spells.name: БSpirit RushБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлAhri dashes forward and fires essence bolts, damaging 3 nearby enemies (prioritizes Champions). Spirit Rush can be cast up to three times before going on cooldown.ПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip: БбГгДдЖжЗзNimbly dashes forward firing 3 essence bolts at nearby enemies (prioritizes Champions) dealing ЗжЖдДгГбБ{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})БбГгДдЖжЗ magic damage. Can be cast up to three times within 10 seconds before going on cooldown.ЗжЖдДгГбБ

passive.name: БбEssence TheftБ
passive.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛGains a charge of Essence Theft whenever a spell hits an enemy (max: 3 charges per spell). Upon reaching 9 charges, the next spell has 35% Spell Vamp.ЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
